extendedInfo.description: When it comes to sous vide cooking, the most difficult thing to figure out is the time and temperature range to use for various foods. We have compiled a list of times and temperatures you can use as a reference guide for your cooking. We even give you a place to save your own notes as you try them out.We offer over 400 sous vide time and temperature combinations across 175 cuts of meat and types of fish and vegetables. Conveniently broken up into 10 main categories for ease of use:- Beef Roasts and Tough Cuts- Beef Steaks and Tender Cuts- Pork- Chicken- Duck- Fish- Shellfish- Lamb- Turkey- Fruits and VegetablesEach of these main categories has a lengthy description of how sous vide relates to that type of food and discusses both the time and temperature guidelines and the general process for cooking it. We then list the cuts of meat or types of food in that category and provide a short description of each item and one or more recommended time and temperature combinations.Also included is a brief introduction to sous vide, a discussion of sous vide safety, links to more sous vide resources, and an overview of how to substitute sous vide food into your favorite traditional recipes.While there are no recipes in this app, the best part about sous vide is how interchangeable it is with existing recipes. You can take many traditional recipes and follow them to the letter with the only exception being to replace the cooking of the meat with sous vide instead of baking, braising, pan-frying, sauteing, etc.Take your favorite chili recipe and use turkey, beef, or chicken that was cooked sous vide. Make fajitas and instead of grilling the meat try cooking it sous vide. Sausage for pasta, roasted rack of lamb, steak for salad, fried chicken, and corned beef can all be cooked sous vide while keeping the same marinades, sauces, and sides as the traditional recipes call for.We hope you'll use this guide as a starting point to explore sous vide cooking more on your own!

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: This is an iphone app that\'s been ported to Android. As a result the interface is clumsy - they even use the iphone screenshots on the Google Play Store.   For a paid app this isn\'t good enough. Redesign it and come back!
reviews.author: Andy Geoghegan

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: A lot of information but very dated, poor operating menus and not easy to maneuver around app. The note system doesn\'t work it lets you type but doesnt save.  Needs a face lift looks like its a website from 1993.
reviews.author: Nicholas Malloy

reviews.title: Crashing and can\'t get it to run.
reviews.author: Jay Brown

reviews.title: Poor navigation
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t make good use of android navigation principles. Content is good, but never updated
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes every time.
reviews.comment: Works on my Samsung tab, but had it on my HTC sensation , crashed everytime. I have now an HTC desire, again, crashes every time, usually within ten seconds.
reviews.author: Blair Dance

reviews.title: Crashes after 10 seconds every time!!! Htc rezound user.
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried this app over 15 times on my htc rezound, and it crashes every time after 10 seconds!! This is unacceptable!
reviews.author: David Anthony

reviews.title: Crashes below Jelly Bean OS
reviews.comment: Good basic content, shows celsius & fahrenheit now, but crashed all the time so couldn\'t use on ICS4 OS or below.  Since upgrading phone recently to HTC One X+ Jelly Bean OS now app works fine.  Agree it needs a facelift...very 80\'s 90\'s feel.  iPhone has a very professional sous vide app!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Handy app and reasonable price. But it is very slow on a modern Droid 2. Similiar app to iPhone. Perhaps a non optimized conversion?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Crashes every time I try to use it. HTC One xl
reviews.author: Andrew Young

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: Nexus S with latest updates es. Maybe have to sous vide the phone? App should also give all temperatures in   Celsius alongside Fahrenheit in all recipes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A handy reference for time and temp requirements for all meats and vegetables. Good explanations of why listed time and temp works. Bargain price!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: This app is useless on my HTC Sensation XE with Android 4.0. It crashes within a few seconds every time...
reviews.author: A Google User
